Great chemistry, incredible visuals, lots of emotion, and a truly fantastic performance from Josh Brolin as the mad titan Thanos, Avengers: Infinity War is a satisfying way to execute 10 years of build up.
Just perfect... You want to scream and shout at the screen. It just drips with awesomeness.

I was waiting for this film to come out since I saw the first trailer and when I finally saw it it was amazing, thanos was easily the best villian in the mcu and I loved how the movie revolved around him, but every one knows that everyone who faded away in the snap because the people who died contracts are still going and the people who lived contracts are ending
this movie was really enjoyable it was funny action packed and it was just a good movie im looking forward to seeing this again

Kevin Feige deserves all the credit for doing what Kathleen Kennedy can not. Build a cinematic universe that is diverse and complex and compelling. These movies keep getting better and more entertaining. Marvel does it right.
Infinity war is fun and ambitious. but narratively disjointed. Marvel delivered so many deaths that IÂ´m wondering if this movie is going to even happen.

I enjoyed seeing all the Marvel heroes. There were moments of humor and sadness. HOWEVER, there was no storyline whatsoever. It was one action/fight scene piled on top of another with no arc or purpose. 1.) bad guy 2.) two separate teams of good guys 3.) lots of flashy computer generated graphics I was really hoping for more of a story to make me care about the characters. I cared about the heroes only because I was familiar with them from previous movies. Someone got lazy by not making a movie that has a true beginning, middle and end. OopsðŸ¤«
This movie put me through all the feels!
